Package PE1

Class PE1

java.lang.Object
PE1.PE1
public class PE1 extends Object
This class is Maze solver and it includes several algorithms to find right path from entrance gate to exit gate in a maze.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mehrshad Farahbakhsh.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup(String[][] maze)
      This method sets up the maze using the given input argument
      Parameters:
      maze - is a maze that is used to construct the dogMaze

    • enoughGate

      public boolean enoughGate()
      This method returns true if the number of gates in dogMaze >= 2.
      Returns:
      it returns true, if enough gate exists (at least 2), otherwise false.

    • topSide

      public int topSide(int column, int count)
      This method counts the number of gates that they are open from the top in the first row
      Parameters:
      column - is the index of column in the maze
      count - is the number of gates that they are open from the top
      Returns:
      it returns an integer that is the number of gates that they are open from the top in the first row

    • bottomSide

      public int bottomSide(int column, int count)
      This method counts the number of gates that they are open from the bottom in the last row
      Parameters:
      column - is the index of column in the maze
      count - is the number of gates that they are open from the bottom
      Returns:
      it returns an integer that is the number of gates that they are open from the bottom in the last row

    • leftSide

      public int leftSide(int row, int count)
      This method counts the number of gates that they are open from the left in the first column
      Parameters:
      row - is the index of row in the maze
      count - is the number of gates that they are open from the left
      Returns:
      it returns an integer that is the number of gates that they are open from the left in the first column

    • rightSide

      public int rightSide(int row, int count)
      This method counts the number of gates that they are open from the right in the last column
      Parameters:
      row - is the index of row in the maze
      count - is the number of gates that they are open from the right
      Returns:
      it returns an integer that is the number of gates that they are open from the right in the last row

    • findPath

      public String findPath(int row, int column)
      This method finds a path from the entrance gate to the exit gate.
      Parameters:
      row - is the index of the row, where the entrance is.
      column - is the index of the column, where the entrance is.
      Returns:
      it returns a string that contains the path from the start to the end. The return value should have a pattern like this (i,j)(k,l),... The first pair of the output must show the entrance given as the input parameter (i.e. (row,column) No whitespace is allowed in the output.

    • searchRoute

      public Boolean searchRoute(int row, int column, ArrayList<String> pathList, String position)
      This method searches the path and check the open sides of the gate and find the correct gates which are heading to the exit gate
      Parameters:
      row - is the index of the row, where the current gate is.
      column - is the index of the column, where the current gate is.
      pathList - is the list to store row and column of the correct gates that they are heading to exit gate (row,column)
      position - is string of (row,column)
      Returns:
      it returns boolean, if it gets the right path and it is open, it returns true and if it gets the wrong path and it is stock it returns false
